entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 19 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
